message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I'm asking for $120 for it. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I think $100 would be a fair price for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $100 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $110 is my final offer.  Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, thank you for your offer. Considering the value of the product, I believe $95 would be a reasonable price.
